description: This dashboard works with postgres_exporter for prometheus
title: GMV Dashboard

targets.rawSql: SELECT SUM(pi.product_count * pi.product_price) AS total_gmv FROM public.purchases p JOIN public.purchase_items pi ON p.purchase_id = pi.purchase_id WHERE purchase_date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days'

SELECT purchase_date, SUM(pi.product_count * pi.product_price) AS daily_gmv FROM public.purchases p JOIN public.purchase_items pi ON p.purchase_id = pi.purchase_id WHERE purchase_date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days' GROUP BY purchase_date ORDER BY purchase_date

panels.title: GMV by Category for last 30 days

targets.rawSql: SELECT category_name, SUM(pi.product_count * pi.product_price) AS category_gmv FROM public.purchases p JOIN public.purchase_items pi ON p.purchase_id = pi.purchase_id JOIN public.categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE purchase_date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days' GROUP BY category_name

panels.title: Category GMV Dynamics for last 30 days

targets.rawSql: SELECT purchase_date, category_name, SUM(pi.product_count * pi.product_price) AS category_gmv FROM public.purchases p JOIN public.purchase_items pi ON p.purchase_id = pi.purchase_id JOIN public.categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE purchase_date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '30 days' GROUP BY purchase_date, category_name ORDER BY purchase_date, category_name
